transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji, good afternoon. Main Abhishek baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haan, mam, aapka ek call aa raha tha hamare customer care mein. Ji bataiye.
Customer: Haan, sir, maine bola tha ki call kar lena, isliye call kiya hai aapne.
Executive: Main dekh leta hu mam. Aapki aawaz na bahut clear nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Hamari aawaz aapko?
Executive: Haan ji mam, bataiye.
Customer: Thoda product rating ke liye.
Executive: Abhi mam aawaz meri clear ja rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan sir, aapki aawaz aa rahi hai mujhe.
Executive: Haan ji mam. Mam aapki aawaz matlab abhi clear aayi hai. Ab batao kya bolna chahte ho.
Customer: Sir, mujhe IndiaMART pe product rating jaanni thi aur ye jo concern aate hai waha se ki abhi mujhe need chahiye product, uss pe aap research kar sakte hai na? Toh mujhe isme help chahiye thi ki mujhe IndiaMART pe 15 din tak order place nahi ho rahi hai, aisa.
Executive: Thik hai mam, sure. Toh main aapko ek kaam karta hu mam.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: 1 baje ka mam meeting rakhu aapke saath?
Customer: Hmm, thik hai, hmm thik hai.
Executive: Main just aapko around 12:45 ke around mam call karta hu aapko.
Customer: Okay, thik hai.
Executive: Okay mam, okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know product rating on IndiaMART.

- Unable to place order for 15 days.



Resolution:

- Executive scheduled a meeting at 1 PM.

- Executive will call around 12:45 PM.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- product rating, order, meeting
